text: Nocardiopsis valliformis is an alkaliphilic bacterium from the genus of Nocardiopsis which has been isolated from soil from an alkali lake in China.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardiopsis valliformis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria described in 2008
title: Nocardiopsis valliformis
